title: Noble Jones
description: Swiping for love, Scarlett matches with a charming stranger—only to discover he’s a demon using the app to hunt for souls...Enter a world where modern dating collides with supernatural forces, a woman's dreams become the conduit for a dark entity, blurring the lines between reality and fantasy in this gripping tale of love, mystery and the unknown.Scarlett Telfair doesn't believe in ghosts or the "invisible world" yet, she lives in Savannah, Georgia, one of the most haunted cities in North America. What happens when you look for love in all the wrong places and a gut feeling is duly ignored? Internet dating, a shadow man and our brave heroine Scarlett come together in an unforgettable supernatural story about the cost of playing with fire...
author: Bibiana Krall
